do not exhibit the full sixfold symmetry which we would
expect for Re(0001). Instead, a twofold symmetry modulates
the pattern of sixfold rings. The center of this apparent
twofold symmetry is marked by a cross in Fig. 5(
for this – at ﬁrst sight puzzling – deviation from the expected
symmetry becomes clear when we take into consideration that
